name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - D  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Dad the bear holding in his arms?
questions.explanation:
The word "DAD".

	There are actually two different Dad bears.  They both hold the word "DAD," but one holds a green D, a yellow A, and a blue D, and the other has a purple A.  Their ties are different, too.  Both are bow ties, but one is plaid, and one is a very colorful striped bow tie.  They come with different poems, too. Dad the bear (with yellow A): "He'll hug me when I have a frightRead bedtime stories late at nightHe'll make me smile when I am sadThat's why I'm happy he's my dad!" Dad the bear (with purple A): "Dad, you are the best there isAt games and sports you are a whizYou're also kind, and caring, tooI hope you know that I love you!"

questions.text: Which of these bears is a panda?
questions.explanation:
Dainty.

	Dainty is a panda, but unlike real pandas, she's pink.  Everywhere on her body that is normally black, is pink fabric.  She has a very soft fabric. "Although I'm different as can beThe others don't make fun of me'Cause I don't look like you'd thinkInstead of black, my fur is pink!"

questions.text: Which of these is a panda bear?
questions.explanation:
Dancy.

	Dancy is related to Dainty.  Dancy, though, is a purple panda bear.  That is the only difference in these two panda bears. "Pretty as flowers in bloom Sweeter than the best perfume The perfect gift that you can share Dancy, the purple panda bear!"

A pink rose.

	Dearest is a light, pinkish orange bear.  She also has a bow around her neck that is pinkish orange, too.  Her flower is also a pinkish orange color.  She is supposed to represent love. "You cheer me up when I am blueYou make sure I know what to doYour gentle words and your sweet touch Are why I love you very much!"

questions.text: Which of these is not a color that Decade the bear comes in?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	There were several Decade bears created for Ty's tenth anniversary.  The colors of these bears are blue, brown, gold, green, hot pink, orange, purple, red, royal blue, and white.  Their poems are all the same. "Ten years ago a toy was createdAround the world, people were elatedAcross all ages, colors and racesBeanies would put a smile on their faces!"

questions.text: Which of these is a poodle?
questions.explanation:
Demure.

	Demure is not just an ordinary poodle; she's purple.  She wears two purple bows, one in each ear, and has a pink, sparkly collar. "Sometimes when people look at meThey think I'm bold and fancy freeDespite my beauty and allureYou'll find I'm shy and quite demure!"

questions.text: Which of these is a light brown dog with dark brown spots around his eyes?
questions.explanation:
Deputy.

	Deputy the dog is a light brown dog with a huge head.  His ears are also dark brown, just like the spots around his eyes.  His fabric is a very soft fabric. "Around these parts I am the lawI don't rule with an iron pawDon't worry while I'm on the forceUnless you are a cat, of course!"

questions.text: Which of these is an extinct bird?
questions.explanation:
Dinky.

	Dinky is a dodo bird.  The dodo bird became extinct on Earth in the 1600s.  Dinky has a gold beak and gold legs, and has royal blue under his wings.  The rest of his body is a gold and blue mixture. "Alright I know, I'm a little smallBut what's so great about being tall? Soon I'll grow up and you will seeJust how beautiful I will be!"

questions.text: What type of dog is Dooley?
questions.explanation:
Retriever.

	Dooley the dog is a retriever puppy.  He is a light brown, and his fur is a very curly fabric.  He wears a red collar. "Please throw that rubber ball to meAnd I will catch it...watch and seeThen I will bring it back to youPlaying catch is fun to do!"

questions.text: Which of these Beanie Babies is a turkey?
questions.explanation:
Drumstick.

	Drumstick the turkey is a Thanksgiving turkey.  He is brown, orange, and light brown.  Like most turkeys, he has a red waddle under his neck. "A Thanksgiving treat I'd like to share Just to show you that I careA friend like you I do adoreThat's what I'm most thankful for!"
